title: Vinod Kambli breaks silence on health struggles, thanks his wife Andrea and friend Sachin Tendulkar
summary: Former Indian cricketer Vinod Kambli discusses his recent health challenges and acknowledges the crucial support received from his wife Andrea and childhood friend Sachin Tendulkar during his difficult times.
content:
Former Indian cricketer Vinod Kambli has finally addressed his ongoing health struggles that have recently garnered public attention. In an emotional revelation, Kambli detailed the challenges he has been facing and expressed profound gratitude for the unwavering support from his wife Andrea and longtime friend, cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar.

Kambli, who shared a historic 664-run partnership with Tendulkar during their school cricket days, emphasized how his childhood friend has stood by him during these testing times. The former batsman acknowledged that beyond their celebrated cricket connection, it's their enduring friendship that has proven most valuable during his health crisis.

His wife Andrea has been particularly instrumental in managing his medical care and daily routine. Kambli praised her dedication and described her as his 'pillar of strength' throughout this challenging period.

The cricketer's health issues have been a matter of concern in recent months, affecting both his physical wellbeing and his ability to maintain an active public life. Despite these challenges, Kambli maintains a positive outlook, crediting his support system for helping him navigate through this difficult phase.
